00049    char* operator[](int pos) const
00050       {
00051       U_TRACE(0, "ULDAPEntry::operator[](%d) const", pos)
00052 
00053       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_MINOR(pos, n_entry)
00054 
00055       return dn[pos];
00056       }
00057

00074 #ifndef   LDAP_FILTER_ALL
00075 #  define LDAP_FILTER_ALL "(objectClass=*)"

00078 /* types for ldap URL handling
00079 ----------------------------------
00080 typedef struct ldap_url_desc {
00081    char*    lud_scheme;
00082    char*    lud_host;
00083    int      lud_port;
00084    char*    lud_dn;
00085    char**   lud_attrs;
00086    int      lud_scope;
00087    char*    lud_filter;
00088    char**   lud_exts;
00089    int      lud_crit_exts;
00090 } LDAPURLDesc;
00091 */
00092 
00093 class U_EXPORT ULDAP {
00094 public:
00095 
00096    // Check for memory error
00097    U_MEMORY_TEST
00098 
00099    // Allocator e Deallocator
00100    U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00101    U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00102 
00103    // COSTRUTTORI
00104 
00105    ULDAP()
00106       {
00107       U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, ULDAP, "", 0)
00108 
00109       ld           = 0;
00110       ludpp        = 0;
00111       result       = 52;
00112       pTimeOut     = &timeOut;
00113       isSecure     = false;
00114       searchResult = 0;
00115       }
00116 
00117    ~ULDAP();
00118 
00119    // VARIE

00121    const char* error();
00122 
00123    bool set_protocol(int protocol = LDAP_VERSION3)
00124       {
00125       U_TRACE(1, "ULDAP::set_protocol(%d)", protocol)
00126 
00127       U_CHECK_MEMORY
00128 
00129       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(ld)
00130 
00131       result = U_SYSCALL(ldap_set_option, "%p,%d,%d", ld, LDAP_OPT_PROTOCOL_VERSION, &protocol);
00132 
00133       U_RETURN(result == LDAP_OPT_SUCCESS);
00134       }
00135 
00136    bool simple_bind(const char* who = "", const char* passwd = "")
00137       {
00138       U_TRACE(1, "ULDAP::simple_bind(%S,%S)", who, passwd)
00139 
00140       U_CHECK_MEMORY
00141 
00142       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(ld)
00143 
00144       result = U_SYSCALL(ldap_simple_bind_s, "%p,%S,%S", ld, who, passwd);
00145 
00146       U_RETURN(result == LDAP_SUCCESS);
00147       }
00148 
00149    bool bind(const char* who = "", const char* cred = "", int authmethod = LDAP_AUTH_SIMPLE)
00150       {
00151       U_TRACE(1, "ULDAP::bind(%S,%S,%d)", who, cred, authmethod)
00152 
00153       U_CHECK_MEMORY
00154 
00155       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(ld)
00156 
00157       result = U_SYSCALL(ldap_bind_s, "%p,%S,%S,%d", ld, who, cred, authmethod);
00158 
00159       U_RETURN(result == LDAP_SUCCESS);
00160       }
00161 
00162    // ---------------------------------------------------------------
00163    // LDAP url operations
00164    // ---------------------------------------------------------------
00165    // ldap://ou=Sales,o=Acme?sn?one
00166    // ldaps://Acme.com:636/o=Acme?objectclass?one\n
00167    // ldap://Acme.com:389/ou=Sales,o=Acme?sn,mail?sub?(objectclass=*)
00168    // ---------------------------------------------------------------
00169 
00170    bool init(const char* url);
00171 
00172    bool init(const char* host, int port) // LDAP_PORT(389)
00173       {
00174       U_TRACE(1, "ULDAP::init(%S,%d)", host, port)
00175 
00176       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(ld,0)
00177 
00178       ld = (LDAP*) U_SYSCALL(ldap_init, "%S,%d", host, port);
00179 
00180       if (ld == 0)
00181          {
00182          result = 52;
00183 
00184          U_RETURN(false);
00185          }
00186 
00187       U_RETURN(true);
00188       }
00189 
00190    // LDAP manual operations
00191 
00192    bool open(const char* host = "localhost", int port = 389)
00193       {
00194       U_TRACE(1, "ULDAP::open(%S,%d)", host, port)
00195 
00196       U_CHECK_MEMORY
00197 
00198       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(ld, 0)
00199 
00200       ld = (LDAP*) U_SYSCALL(ldap_open, "%S,%d", host, port);
00201 
00202       U_RETURN(ld != 0);
00203       }
00204 
00205    bool add(const char* dn, LDAPMod* ldapmods[])

00207       U_TRACE(1, "ULDAP::add(%S,%p)", dn, ldapmods)
00208 
00209       U_CHECK_MEMORY
00210 
00211       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(ld)
00212 
00213       result = U_SYSCALL(ldap_add_s, "%p,%S,%p", ld, dn, ldapmods);
00214 
00215       U_RETURN(result == LDAP_SUCCESS);
00216       }

00226       result = U_SYSCALL(ldap_modify_s, "%p,%S,%p", ld, dn, ldapmods);
00227 
00228       U_RETURN(result == LDAP_SUCCESS);
00229       }

00231    bool remove(const char* dn)
00232       {
00233       U_TRACE(1, "ULDAP::remove(%S)", dn)
00234 
00235       U_CHECK_MEMORY
00236 
00237       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(ld)
00238 
00239       result = U_SYSCALL(ldap_delete_s, "%p,%S", ld, dn);
00240 
00241       U_RETURN(result == LDAP_SUCCESS);
00242       }

00244    void setTimeOut(struct timeval* timeout)
00245       {
00246       U_TRACE(0, "ULDAP::setTimeOut(%p)", timeout)
00247 
00248 #if !defined(LDAP_OPT_NETWORK_TIMEOUT) && defined(LDAP_OPT_TIMELIMIT)
00249 #  define LDAP_OPT_NETWORK_TIMEOUT LDAP_OPT_TIMELIMIT
00250 #endif
00251 
00252       ldap_set_option(0, LDAP_OPT_NETWORK_TIMEOUT, (pTimeOut = timeout));
00253       }
00254 
00255    // ---------------------
00256    // search scopes
00257    // ---------------------
00258    // LDAP_SCOPE_BASE     0
00259    // LDAP_SCOPE_ONELEVEL 1
00260    // LDAP_SCOPE_SUBTREE  2
00261    // ---------------------
00262 
00263    int search(const char* dn, int scope = LDAP_SCOPE_BASE, char* attrs[] = 0, const char* filter = LDAP_FILTER_ALL)
00264       {
00265       U_TRACE(1, "ULDAP::search(%S,%d,%p,%S)", dn, scope, attrs, filter)
00266 
00267       U_CHECK_MEMORY
00268 
00269       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(ld)
00270 
00271       result = U_SYSCALL(ldap_search_st,"%p,%S,%d,%S,%p,%d,%p,%p",ld,dn,scope,filter,attrs,0,pTimeOut,&searchResult);
00272 
00273       int num = (result == LDAP_SUCCESS ? U_SYSCALL(ldap_count_entries, "%p,%p", ld, searchResult) : -1);
00274 
00275       U_RETURN(num);
00276       }
00277 
00278    int search()
00279       {
00280       U_TRACE(1, "ULDAP::search()")
00281 
00282       U_CHECK_MEMORY
00283 
00284       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(ld)
00285       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(ludpp)
00286 
00287       return search(ludpp->lud_dn, ludpp->lud_scope, ludpp->lud_attrs, ludpp->lud_filter);
00288       }
00289 
00290 #ifdef HAVE_LDAP_SSL_H
00291    bool search(const char* url)
00292       {
00293       U_TRACE(1, "ULDAP::search(%S)", url)
00294 
00295       U_CHECK_MEMORY
00296 
00297       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(ld)
00298 
00299       /* Search the directory */
00300 
00301       result = U_SYSCALL(ldap_url_search_st, "%p,%S,%d,%p,%p",
00302                            ld,             /* LDAP session handle */
00303                            url,            /* LDAP URL to use in the search operation */
00304                            0,              /* return attributes and values */
00305                            pTimeOut,       /* search timeout */
00306                            &searchResult); /* returned results */
00307 
00308       U_RETURN(result == LDAP_SUCCESS);
00309       }
00310 #endif
00311 
00312    void sort(const char* sortAttribute = "sn")
00313       {
00314       U_TRACE(0, "ULDAP::sort(%S)", sortAttribute)
00315 
00316       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(ld)
00317       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(searchResult)
00318 
00319       ldap_sort_entries(ld, &searchResult, (char*)sortAttribute, strcmp); /* client-sort */
00320       }

00322    /* Example (from NGSS):
00323     * ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00324     * #define HOST_STRING     "host"
00325     * #define RULE_STRING     "rule"
00326     * #define VERSION_STRING  "version"
00327     * #define MIN_STRING      "min"
00328     * #define AGE_STRING      "age"
00329     *
00330     * static const char* attr_name[] = { HOST_STRING, RULE_STRING, VERSION_STRING, MIN_STRING, AGE_STRING, 0 };
00331     *
00332     * LDAPEntry entry(attr_name, 5};
00333     * ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00334     */
00335 
00336    void get(ULDAPEntry& e);

00340 #ifdef DEBUG

00350    bool isSecure;
00351 
00352    static struct timeval timeOut;
